amendment.description: To amend the preamble by modifying a date.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1057 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1057 proposed by Senator Whitehouse for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S7628; text: CR S7628) To amend the preamble by modifying a date.
